mapper.select:
select
from t_voucher_info a where a.t_Voucher_ID = #{t_Voucher_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by a.create_time

select
from t_voucher_info a where
a.t_Voucher_Name like CONCAT('%',#{t_Voucher_Name},'%')
and a.t_Voucher_ProdCat like CONCAT('%',#{t_Voucher_ProdCat},'%')
and a.t_Voucher_VendorName like CONCAT('%',#{t_Voucher_VendorName},'%')
and a.t_Voucher_3rdprty like CONCAT('%',#{t_Voucher_3rdprty},'%')
and a.t_Voucher_CorpPool like CONCAT('%',#{t_Voucher_CorpPool},'%')
and a.t_P_VendorEmployeeName like CONCAT('%',#{t_P_VendorEmployeeName},'%')
and a.remark like CONCAT('%',#{remark},'%')
order by a.create_time
